articles.content:

articles.content:
Bryan Robson believes it was a good move by Ole Gunnar Solskjaer to hand the Manchester United captaincy to Harry Maguire earlier this season.

articles.title: How Arsenal, Chelsea and Tottenham fans can watch the Bundesliga on TV - Football.London
articles.description: The Bundesliga is due to resume on May 16 - the first major European league to do so
articles.content:
Live European football is set to return to TV screens on May 16 as the Bundesliga restarts behind-closed-doors.
Germany's top- flight football season will return under strict health and safety rules and with no fans attending games, a move that the Premier L… [+2423 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Chelsea's Christian Pulisic sends message to Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp - Mirror Online
articles.description: The American international broke through at Borussia Dortmund when Klopp was still in charge, and was introduced to first-team training by the now Liverpool boss
articles.content:
Chelsea's Christian Pulisic says he'll be forever grateful to Jurgen Klopp for introducing him to the first-team environment at Borussia Dortmund.

articles.title: Arsene Wenger tips English youngster to overtake Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo - Irish Mirror
articles.description: Former Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger believes England could produce football's next superstar to take over from Lionel Messi and Cristiano Ronaldo - but Kylian Mbappe is the front-runner
articles.content:
Arsene Wenger has always had an eye for talent.
